head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KETCHAM, STELLA HILL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KETCHAM, STELLA HILL

block.p: KETCHAM-Stella Hill. Of Lenox, Massachusetts (formerly of Sands Point, NY), December 28, 1997. Beloved wife of the late Garry M. Ketcham. Cherished sister-in-law of Loraine Ketcham LeNoir, the late Helen Shaughnessy and the late Roy Ketcham. Beloved aunt of Marie Ketcham, James Shaughnessy, Joan Walsh, Susan Souhrada, Mary Jane Beaulieu and the late Anne Weischedel. Proud grand aunt of 20 and great grand aunt of 39. Reposing at the Fredrick J. Chapey & Sons West Islip Funeral Home, Montauk Hwy. (1/4 mile west of Robert Moses Cswy.) Celebration of the Liturgy of Christian Burial, St. Patrick's R.C. Church, Bay Shore, Wednesday, 10 A.M. Interment St. Patrick's Cemetery, Bay Shore, L.I. Visiting Tuesday 2-4 and 7-9 P.M. Donations may be made to North Shore University Hospital, 300 Community Drive, Manhasset, N.Y. 11030 or a favorite charity.
